lead_paragraph: Life Emergency Response Inc., a provider of home emergency medical alert systems marketed to the elderly, is the target of a $2 million lawsuit accusing the company of high-pressure and misleading sales tactics. The company, based in Chatsworth, is named in a lawsuit filed on Wednesday in Sonoma County Superior Court by District Attorneys in eight counties. The state's Attorney General joined the suit.
